### [Functions](/documentation/Foundation/legacy-map-table-implementation#Functions)

[`func NSAllMapTableKeys(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>) -> [Any]`](/documentation/foundation/nsallmaptablekeys(_:))Returns all of the keys in the specified map table.[`func NSAllMapTableValues(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>) -> [Any]`](/documentation/foundation/nsallmaptablevalues(_:))Returns all of the values in the specified table.[`func NSCompareMapTables(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>, NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>) -> Bool`](/documentation/foundation/nscomparemaptables(_:_:))Compares the elements of two map tables for equality.[`func NSCopyMapTableWithZone(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>, NSZone?) -> NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>`](/documentation/foundation/nscopymaptablewithzone(_:_:))Performs a shallow copy of the specified map table.[`func NSCountMapTable(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>) -> Int`](/documentation/foundation/nscountmaptable(_:))Returns the number of elements in a map table.[`func NSCreateMapTable(NSMapTableKeyCallBacks, NSMapTableValueCallBacks, Int) -> NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>`](/documentation/foundation/nscreatemaptable(_:_:_:))Creates a new map table in the default zone.[`func NSCreateMapTableWithZone(NSMapTableKeyCallBacks, NSMapTableValueCallBacks, Int, NSZone?) -> NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>`](/documentation/foundation/nscreatemaptablewithzone(_:_:_:_:))Creates a new map table in the specified zone.[`func NSEndMapTableEnumeration(UnsafeMutablePointer<NSMapEnumerator>)`](/documentation/foundation/nsendmaptableenumeration(_:))Used when finished with an enumerator.[`func NSEnumerateMapTable(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>) -> NSMapEnumerator`](/documentation/foundation/nsenumeratemaptable(_:))Creates an enumerator for the specified map table.[`func NSFreeMapTable(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>)`](/documentation/foundation/nsfreemaptable(_:))Deletes the specified map table.[`func NSMapGet(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>, UnsafeRawPointer?) -> UnsafeMutableRawPointer?`](/documentation/foundation/nsmapget(_:_:))Returns a map table value for the specified key.[`func NSMapInsert(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>, UnsafeRawPointer?, UnsafeRawPointer?)`](/documentation/foundation/nsmapinsert(_:_:_:))Inserts a key-value pair into the specified table.[`func NSMapInsertIfAbsent(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>, UnsafeRawPointer?, UnsafeRawPointer?) -> UnsafeMutableRawPointer?`](/documentation/foundation/nsmapinsertifabsent(_:_:_:))Inserts a key-value pair into the specified table.[`func NSMapInsertKnownAbsent(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>, UnsafeRawPointer?, UnsafeRawPointer?)`](/documentation/foundation/nsmapinsertknownabsent(_:_:_:))Inserts a key-value pair into the specified table if the pair had not been previously added.[`func NSMapMember(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>, UnsafeRawPointer, UnsafeMutablePointer<UnsafeMutableRawPointer?>?, UnsafeMutablePointer<UnsafeMutableRawPointer?>?) -> Bool`](/documentation/foundation/nsmapmember(_:_:_:_:))Indicates whether a given table contains a given key.[`func NSMapRemove(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>, UnsafeRawPointer?)`](/documentation/foundation/nsmapremove(_:_:))Removes a key and corresponding value from the specified table.[`func NSNextMapEnumeratorPair(UnsafeMutablePointer<NSMapEnumerator>, UnsafeMutablePointer<UnsafeMutableRawPointer?>?, UnsafeMutablePointer<UnsafeMutableRawPointer?>?) -> Bool`](/documentation/foundation/nsnextmapenumeratorpair(_:_:_:))Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the next map-table pair in the enumeration are set.[`func NSResetMapTable(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>)`](/documentation/foundation/nsresetmaptable(_:))Deletes the elements of the specified map table.[`func NSStringFromMapTable(NSMapTable<AnyObject, AnyObject>) -> String`](/documentation/foundation/nsstringfrommaptable(_:))Returns a string describing the map tableâ€™s contents.### [Data Types](/documentation/Foundation/legacy-map-table-implementation#Data-Types)

[`struct NSMapEnumerator`](/documentation/foundation/nsmapenumerator)Allows successive elements of a map table to be returned each time this structure is passed to [`NSNextMapEnumeratorPair(_:_:_:)`](/documentation/foundation/nsnextmapenumeratorpair(_:_:_:)).[NSMapTable](/documentation/foundation/legacy-nsmaptable)The opaque data type used by the functions described in Managing Map Tables.[`struct NSMapTableKeyCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsmaptablekeycallbacks)The function pointers used to configure behavior of `NSMapTable` with respect to key elements within a map table.[`typealias NSMapTableOptions`](/documentation/foundation/nsmaptableoptions)Constants used as components in a bitfield to specify the behavior of elements (keys and values) in an `NSMapTable` object.[`struct NSMapTableValueCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsmaptablevaluecallbacks)The function pointers used to configure behavior of `NSMapTable` with respect to value elements within a map table.### [Constants](/documentation/Foundation/legacy-map-table-implementation#Constants)

[`let NSIntegerMapKeyCallBacks: NSMapTableKeyCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsintegermapkeycallbacks)For keys that are pointer-sized quantities or smaller (for example, `int`, `long`, or `unichar`).[`let NSIntMapKeyCallBacks: NSMapTableKeyCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsintmapkeycallbacks)For keys that are pointer-sized quantities or smaller (for example, `int`, `long`, or `unichar`).Deprecated[`let NSNonOwnedPointerMapKeyCallBacks: NSMapTableKeyCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsnonownedpointermapkeycallbacks)For keys that are pointers not freed.[`let NSNonOwnedPointerOrNullMapKeyCallBacks: NSMapTableKeyCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsnonownedpointerornullmapkeycallbacks)For keys that are pointers not freed, or `NULL`.[`let NSNonRetainedObjectMapKeyCallBacks: NSMapTableKeyCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsnonretainedobjectmapkeycallbacks)For sets of objects, but without retaining/releasing.[`let NSObjectMapKeyCallBacks: NSMapTableKeyCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsobjectmapkeycallbacks)For keys that are objects.[`let NSOwnedPointerMapKeyCallBacks: NSMapTableKeyCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsownedpointermapkeycallbacks)For keys that are pointers, with transfer of ownership upon insertion.### [Constants](/documentation/Foundation/legacy-map-table-implementation#Constants)

[`let NSIntegerMapValueCallBacks: NSMapTableValueCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsintegermapvaluecallbacks)For values that are pointer-sized quantities, (for example, `int`, `long`, or `unichar`).[`let NSIntMapValueCallBacks: NSMapTableValueCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsintmapvaluecallbacks)For values that are pointer-sized quantities, (for example, `int`, `long`, or `unichar`).Deprecated[`let NSNonOwnedPointerMapValueCallBacks: NSMapTableValueCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsnonownedpointermapvaluecallbacks)For values that are not owned pointers.[`let NSOwnedPointerMapValueCallBacks: NSMapTableValueCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsownedpointermapvaluecallbacks)For values that are owned pointers.[`let NSNonRetainedObjectMapValueCallBacks: NSMapTableValueCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsnonretainedobjectmapvaluecallbacks)For sets of objects, but without retaining/releasing.[`let NSObjectMapValueCallBacks: NSMapTableValueCallBacks`](/documentation/foundation/nsobjectmapvaluecallbacks)For values that are objects.## [See Also](/documentation/Foundation/legacy-map-table-implementation#see-also)
